name: Casual Bookkeeper/Accountant
description:
We are looking for a casual bookkeeper once or twice a week to assist us in our Gold Coast based office. Some remote/home office work is possible.
  • Journal entry
  • Account reconciliation
  • Fixed asset Register
  • Payable and receivable recording
  • Inventory adjustment 
  • GST and account reconciliation
  • A successfully completed (accounting) university degree or a successfully completed technical/commercial certificate in bookkeeping or Diploma in accounting.
  • Several years of professional experience in bookkeeping, preferably with MYOB.
  • Strong communication skills
  • Efficient work organisation and time management 
  • Accuracy and attention to detail
  • Experience assisting small to medium-sized businesses with all aspects of bookkeeping, including Fixed asset, Inventory, account reconciliation.
  • A challenging casual job in an open-minded and ambitious team 
  • A modern and secure workplace in a central location in Gold Coast with public transport links
  • Close cooperation and international exchange with our worldwide locations
  • An open corporate culture and an international, friendly working environment await you

name: IT System Engineer Digitalization (m/f/d)
description:
• Setting up and maintaining new installations for our customers
  • Design and Administration of the Costumer new digital solutions
  • Testing of UI/UE environment for customers
  • Administration and Monitoring of API Connectivity
  • Administration and monitoring of datacenter and client system
  • Administration of MDM system
  • Support for issues in the environment
  • Correct administration of incidents in ticketing system
  • Autonomous and fast learner for complex infrastructure  
  • Participating in the standby
  • MCSA, better MCSE certificated
  • Linux certification would be an advantage
  • More than 5 years of experience as Windows system engineer
  • More than 3 years of experience in an international team and as system engineer
  • Extensive experience in managing mobile devices, migrating to hybrid cloud environments, and managing API connectivity.
  • Experience with Grafana
  • Experience with Monitoring Systems
  • Good knowledge of Linux
  • Good interpersonal, written, and oral communication skills in German and English
  • Technical documentation skills
  • Modern, centrally located office: Just a 5-minute walk from Bahrenfeld station - easy access guaranteed!
  • Open corporate culture: Immerse yourself in an international working environment where ideas and diversity are encouraged.
  • Collegial working atmosphere: Enjoy a working atmosphere characterized by collaboration and a hands-on mentality
  • Hybrid working model: Flexibility - combine on-site and home office work.
  • 30 days holiday: More time for relaxation and leisure. Additional days off on 24 December, 31 December and half a day on your birthday.
  • Attractive remuneration package: We reward your performance appropriately.
  • Sodexo vouchers: For carefree catering while you work.
  • HVV season ticket or underground car park subsidy: Support for your convenient journey.
  • JobRad: Take advantage of the opportunity to lease a JobRad after your probationary period.
  • Company pension scheme: With a generous 25% employer contribution of up to €75.

name: Lead Software Test Engineer
description:
Are you an experienced Lead software tester, ready to take the next step in your career?

You like exciting projects and working as a core member of an international team?

Are you interested in the telecommunications industry?

As a member of our team you will participate in manual and automated testing, validating, specifying and documenting of the IT and telecommunication systems produced and operated by our company. You will take an active part in test planning, test case development and test group leading. You will work close with other team members: software developers, product owners, IT guys and external partners.

Major responsibilities and tasks

  • Develop and maintain comprehensive test plans and test cases based on project requirements.
  • Estimate testing efforts and resources required for various phases of the project
  • Lead the execution of test cases, including functional, regression, integration, performance, and security testing.
  • Ensure timely and accurate reporting of test results, defects, and quality metrics.
  • Monitor and manage defect resolution, working closely with development teams to ensure timely fixes.
  • Provide guidance and mentorship to junior testers and QA team members.
  • Assign tasks, manage workloads, and ensure that team members adhere to testing standards and processes.
  • Foster a collaborative and positive team environment, encouraging continuous learning and improvement.
  • Collaborate with developers, product owners, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and clarify expectations.
  • Participate in project meetings, providing insights and updates on testing progress and issues.
  • Communicate effectively with stakeholders to ensure alignment and transparency throughout the testing lifecycle.
  • Define and implement test strategies to ensure thorough coverage and alignment with project goals.
  • Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in testing tools, methodologies, and technologies.
  • Maintain and update testing documentation as needed to reflect changes in requirements and processes.
  • Document test plans, test cases, and test results for reference and auditing and training purposes.
  • Conduct regular reviews and retrospectives to assess the effectiveness of testing efforts and make necessary adjustments

Required qualifications and skills

  • Minimum of 5-7 years of experience in software testing and quality assurance, with at least 2-3 years in a lead and senior tester role
  • Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • Strong understanding of software testing principles, methodologies, and best practice
  • Experience with various testing tools and frameworks (e.g., Selenium, JUnit, TestNG, LoadRunner, Jmeter, Postman, SoapUI)
  • Familiarity with CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI, Azure DevOps)
  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Strong communication and interpersonal abilities
  • Attention to detail and a commitment to quality
  • Certifications in software testing (e.g., ISTQB, CSTE).
  • Experience with agile and DevOps practices.
  • Experience in performance and security testing.
  • Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
  • Leadership and team management skills.
  • Independent problem-solving skills and product focused way of thinking 
  • Good command of English
  • Microsoft technologies (Windows infrastructure, IIS)
  • Database basics (SQL/MSSQL)

 

Advantage:

  • Programming basics (C#/.NET)
  • Proficiency in programming and scripting languages (e.g., Java, Python, JavaScript) is a plus
  • Atlassian JIRA/Confluence
  • Robotframework
  • Linux knowledge
  • VOIP
  • Non-Functional Testing tool (e.g.: JMeter)
  • Experience in mobile application testing

We are offering

  • professional challenges, inspiring, diverse tasks
  • structured development process
  • learning path on new technologies (AI, LLM)
  • multiculture environment
  • flexible working hours and home office days
  • relaxed atmosphere, steady, supportive international team
  • easily accessible modern office with good infrastructure
  • complimentary coffee, fruits and snacks

name: Senior Technical Project Manager (m/f/d)
description:
• Ensuring the success of complex, national and international IT and telecommunication projects from requirements analysis to system deployment 
  • Planning, organization, implementation, controlling and documentation of customer projects with international project teams.
  • Creation and monitoring of project budgets. 
  • Leading regular project meetings with all involved departments and stakeholders
  • Gathering technical information for installations and enhancements 
  • Responsiblity for the roll-out of the Telio products and solutions 
  • On-site visits and technical assessment of the implemented measures
  • Coordination and control of external companies
  • Proactive communication with customers and execution of workshops and meetings 
  • Supporting national and international tenders
  • A successfully completed (technical) university degree or a successfully completed commercial apprenticeship 
  • Minimum 3-5 years of professional experience in project management 
  • Desire to act in international project management and experience in the IT environment, ideally in network, telecommunication and hardware  
  • Teamplayer, agile and solution-oriented thinking and acting and strong communication skills
  • Willingness to travel and flexibility for working in an international environment
  • High willingness to learn, a self-reliant way of working and assertiveness
  • Efficient work organisation and time management 
  • Very good knowledge of English and German, further language skills such as French, Hungarian or Dutch are an advantage
  • Modern, centrally located office: Just a 5-minute walk from Bahrenfeld station - easy access guaranteed!
  • Open corporate culture: Immerse yourself in an international working environment where ideas and diversity are encouraged.
  • Collegial working atmosphere: Enjoy a working atmosphere characterized by collaboration and a hands-on mentality
  • Hybrid working model: Flexibility - combine on-site and home office work.
  • 30 days holiday: More time for relaxation and leisure. Additional days off on 24 December, 31 December and half a day on your birthday.
  • Attractive remuneration package: We reward your performance appropriately.
  • Sodexo vouchers: For carefree catering while you work.
  • HVV season ticket or underground car park subsidy: Support for your convenient journey.
  • JobRad: Take advantage of the opportunity to lease a JobRad after your probationary period.
  • Company pension scheme: With a generous 25% employer contribution of up to €75.
